LightningComponentBundle.description: Navigates to a record page in a specific mode (View, Edit or Clone). Can also display a button if you don't want to navigate automatically.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Id of the record to navigate to.

property.name: autoNavigate
property.label: Auto. navigate?
property.description: When TRUE navigates automatically to the provided record id page. When FALSE displays a button to allow user to navigate manually.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button - Label
property.description: The text to be displayed inside the button.

property.name: buttonTitle
property.label: Button - Title
property.description: The text to be displayed as the title of the button.

property.name: buttonVariant
property.label: Button - Variant
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of the button. Accepted variants: base, neutral, brand, brand-outline, destructive, destructive-text, inverse, success
